mapper.insert: insert into tbl_contacts( id, owner, source, customerId, fullname, appellation, email, mphone, job, createBy, createTime, contactSummary, description, nextContactTime, address ) values ( #{id}, #{owner}, #{source}, #{customerId}, #{fullname}, #{appellation}, #{email}, #{mphone}, #{job}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{description}, #{contactSummary}, #{nextContactTime}, #{address} )
mapper.select: select id,fullname,email,mphone from tbl_contacts where fullname like '%' #{name} '%'
